mapper.select: SELECT EQUIP_COND_SEQ , WARMUP_COND , WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , FITUP_COND , FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , FIRST_COND , FIRST_ALWNCE_PLUS , FIRST_ALWNCE_MINUS , SECOND_COND , SECOND_ALWNCE_PLUS , SECOND_ALWNCE_MINUS , JINJEOP_COND , JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS , JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS , REFORM_COND , REFORM_ALWNCE_PLUS , REFORM_ALWNCE_MINUS , REG_ID AS regId , REG_DATE AS regDate , UPD_ID AS updId , UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM TB_EQUIP_TEMPATUR_COND_ADM WHERE EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT EQUIP_COND_SEQ , WARMUP_COND , WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , FITUP_COND , FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , FIRST_COND , FIRST_ALWNCE_PLUS , FIRST_ALWNCE_MINUS , SECOND_COND , SECOND_ALWNCE_PLUS , SECOND_ALWNCE_MINUS , JINJEOP_COND , JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS , JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS , REFORM_COND , REFORM_ALWNCE_PLUS , REFORM_ALWNCE_MINUS , REG_ID AS regId , REG_DATE AS regDate , UPD_ID AS updId , UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM TB_EQUIP_TIME_COND_ADM WHERE EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT EQUIP_COND_SEQ , WARMUP_COND , WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , FITUP_COND , FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , FIRST_COND , FIRST_ALWNCE_PLUS , FIRST_ALWNCE_MINUS , SECOND_COND , SECOND_ALWNCE_PLUS , SECOND_ALWNCE_MINUS , JINJEOP_COND , JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS , JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS , REFORM_COND , REFORM_ALWNCE_PLUS , REFORM_ALWNCE_MINUS , REG_ID AS regId , REG_DATE AS regDate , UPD_ID AS updId , UPD_DATE AS updDate FROM TB_EQUIP_PRESSURE_COND_ADM WHERE EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT EQUIP_COND_SEQ , WP_LEFT_COND , WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , WP_RIGHT_COND , WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PITCH_LEFT_COND , PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PITCH_RIGHT_COND , PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_WING_LEFT_COND , PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_WING_RIGHT_COND , PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_COND , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_COND , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , FILM_COND , FILM_ALWNCE_PLUS , FILM_ALWNCE_MINUS , METAL_DEPTH_COND , METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_PLUS , METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_MINUS , METAL_THICKNESS_COND , METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_PLUS , METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_MINUS , TH_CENTER_COND , TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , TH_EDGE_COND , TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_PLUS , TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_MINUS , BURR_COND , BURR_ALWNCE_PLUS , BURR_ALWNCE_MINUS , REG_ID , REG_DATE , UPD_ID , UPD_DATE FROM TB_EQUIP_SIZE_COND_ADM WHERE EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}
